email.subject: Time to get serious
email.body:
Wow, nice getting into the school network!
Now, it's time to get serious:
----- I want you to get admin access to "The World ISP" connected to the school. - From there, we can access all the terminals in the US! -----
TIP: You need to look out for "tracking" on high-level terminals - and remember to delete "logs" on remote terminals you connect to.
Otherwise the FBI (or other hackers) may try to track you down!
Good luck, - Malvin
Seattle Tech Lab
